venue.address_1: Corner of Beacon and Park Streets
venue.name: The State House, Governor's Office

item.description:
Tuesday, April 7, 2009
Transgender Equality Lobby Day
10 am - 1 pm at the Massachusetts Statehouse - Grand Staircase

Please come educate your legislators about the bill "An Act Relative
to Gender-Based Discrimination and Hate Crimes" and the experiences
transgender people, family, friends, and allies face in Massachusetts
without statewide laws inclusive of gender identity and gender
expression. To kick off the lobby day at 10 am there will be a panel
of speakers including policy makers, transgender people, and family
members; light refreshments; and a short lobbying training. All the
necessary materials and handouts will be provided.

Please make an appointment with your legislators to meet with them on
lobby day.

To do this:

1. Find out who your and Senator are by going to
http://www.wheredoivo...

2. To get the office number and email for your State Representative go
to http://www.mass.gov/l... and for your Senator go to
http://www.mass.gov/l...

3. Check to see if your legislators are current co-sponsors (link)
If so you will be thanking them for their support
If not you will be meeting with them to ask for their support.

For more information or assistance with locating your legislators
contact MTPC at info@masstpc.org or 617-778-0519 or visit
http://www.masstpc.or...

Sponsored by the Massachusetts Transgender Political Coalition (MTPC)

Co-sponsored by: American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) of
Massachusetts, Mass Lesbian and Gay Bar Association (MLGBA), MassNOW,
National Association of Social Workers (NASW-MA), MassEquality,
Massachusetts Gay and Lesbian Political Caucus (MGLPC), Boston
Alliance of GLBT Youth (BAGLY), Gay and Lesbian Advocates and
Defenders (GLAD), The Boston Dyke March.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Transgender Equality Lobby Day
